name: Color Drive
description:
Color Drive is an exciting racing game. Your goal is to switch color to match and smash the ball as you driving and taking off from jumping board.

How to play?
- Slide right or left to switch car color
- Match color to help the car over obstacles.
- Try to smash balls as many as possilble.
- Get high score as you can!

Game Features
- Race your way with fast speed by samshing obstacles.
- Simple and smooth control.
- Multiple levels to challenge
- Awesome graphics and sounds.
Best racing game for fast-paced action game lovers, Download Now!
